column2: an A.M. Eatery////I came here with a party of 9 for a friend's birthday. There was a 2 hour wait
column3: which wasn't as bad as expected since Snooze has an assortment of games for people to play with while waiting
column5: and a plethora of nearby stores to cool down in. Apparently they also send texts to let you know when your table is ready
column6: but we never received one so I'm not sure how reliable that whole process is.
